title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5005.6 - Payment of subscription prizes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5005.6 - Payment of subscription prizes

State Regulations
(a) Amount below a threshold. A prize that is less than $600 will
be placed into the subscriber account created prior to purchase of the
subscriber's first subscription. Such prize may be used to purchase additional
subscriptions or the subscriber may request a cash-out and receive payment for
any unpaid prizes. Payment will be made to the individual subscriber whose name
appears on the application. (b) Amount at or above a threshold. A prize that is $600 or more
will be remitted to the individual subscriber whose name appears on the
application minus any required withholding amount and offsets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

5005.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
